text: @charliekirk11 @MichaelTrader54 The virus originated in China, true. On January 30, the WHO declared the coronavirus to be a Global Health Emergency. In March, #trump was still denying the threat of pandemic. #HillaryClinton would have had a national strategy in place by then. @realDonaldTrump still doesn’t.
